EpiSPIDER is an application that plots emerging infectious disease information from ProMED Mail, combines it with country info from the CIA Factbook and PubMED, extracts location using natural language processing and plots them on Google Maps.
Pearl Jam fansite with links and pictures pulled from various web services.

Create and find bicycle routes for your area. Total distance and elevation graph are calculated as you create the route.Live traffic cams, photos from the ground, known routes, topo maps. Weather feeds for selected cities.
Offers price comparison for online deals. It aggregates deals from a variety of bargain hunting websites into a slick price comparison engine.
As the title implies, this mashup track zeitgeist data as trends geographically. Also let you plot your own trend searches.
A crush system for Facebook. Tell the system who you would like to become better friends with, date, or have a fling with, and if they feel the same way, you'll be sent an e-mail.

Very nicely done interactive map of current world and local news mapped. Double-click on the green markers for more levels of detail. Comprehensive listings, good responsiveness. Data drawn from global and local sources via Topix.net.
Interactive Guide to the Ports and Mooring Places of the Upper Adriatic.

This site displays all vote locations in Amsterdam for general elections in the Netherlands. It also shows which locations are best accessible for people in wheelchairs.All information is only available in Dutch.
Pray In Time provides most accurate and reliable timetable of Athan time for millions of inhabited and uninhabited locations globally.
Custom Google Map of the board game Perplex City. Search features help you find important game locations.
Your grocery list as mashup. Use a barcode scanner and this service to keep track of your running grocery list. Uses data from the UPC Database web service.
Basecamp widget for the Yahoo Widget Engine. Manage your Basecamp projects from your desktop.

Related_APIs: Amazon Product Advertising,Yahoo Search,YouTube,Yahoo Image Search
mashup_Description: Visualized newest interests and buzzwords in Japan. Sources include YouTube and Yahoo.
See live UK travel news and alerts from the BBC on a Google Map.
Uses Google maps API to show affordable accommodation locations worldwide.

GeoSpot consists of a huge directory of geographical spots, like for example theme park, animal, living, shops, bicycle, kids and fun. Languages are Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Swedish or Danish.

Winner of the 2008 Mashup Camp 6 best mashup contest. Mapdango combines many APIs to create an uber map mashup with lots of ways to explore content from from WeatherBug, Flickr, Wikipedia, Eventful, and Gruvr.
Average weather for thousands of global locations in easy to read charts. Temperature, rainfall, snowfall, humidity.
A community-based website for finding and sharing outdoor photography locations such as landscapes, panoramas, wildlife, wildflowers, waterfalls, cityscapes, canyons, and others.
View travel videos from around the world using Google Maps and YouTube.
Twin Cities stores, restaurants, hotels and more.  Organized by category to make it easy to find new destinations in Minneapolis and St. Paul Minnesota.
Great collection of road biking rides in and around Salt Lake City, UT.
Enter a sentence or phrase and Speak will attempt to speak it back. Uses Trynt web service that extracts word definitions from Wiktionary.

YouTorials is an assemblage of free video tutorials collected from YouTube. Users can search or browse through hundreds of videos from how to solve a Rubik cube to how to break-dance. Uses can submit their own videos and subscribe via RSS.
Displays all Montreal subway statons and lines. Markers are placed very accurate. Can display lines separately.
Torrents is a BitTorrent Search Engine powered by TRYNT and Yahoo.
On-demand service offering management infrastructure and community building tools for API providers. Uses the Amazon S3 and EC2 APIs as part of their infrastructure.
CNN Money list of the top 10 most expensive colleges in the United States. Not necessarily the ones you would expect.
Discover restaurants around where you live.
Two-player plug-in game for Yahoo Messenger. Finish the round with fewer shots than the other player to win. There are 50 levels in the game.
Lights up some nixie tubes using Twilio, AppHarbor, Nodejitsu, a Netduino, and an Arduinix Shield.
A small Google Maps Mashup displays the weather forecast and weather-tweets in a nice, simple style.
We have developed a mashup that can help Chinese users to find the postcode of a place. Our mashup leverages the GeoNames web API registered at ProgrammableWeb.

Related_APIs: iTunes and iTunes Connect,Rovi Cloud Services
mashup_Description: AllMusic by Rovi takes the best of AllMusic.com and packages it into a convenient app for mobile music discovery. AllMusic lets you tailor your experience, offering personalized recommendations based on music you already like.

Localmind offers a local conversation platform that lets users search for nearby conversations, create new conversations and interact with current conversations at specific locations around the world.
Ditto is a location iPhone app that lets users get recommendations about restaurants, movies and things to do.
Crowdbeacon is a location-based service focused on providing relevant, localized communication and information to users based on what they need and where they are.

Loqly is a platform to discover places around you and ask/answer questions about local businesses. With Loqly, users can ask for business recommendations or search for a business and ask specific questions. The questions are directed to locals in the area and users get answers in real time.
Enter a Bible reference to have it translated into pirate text.
LikeBible.com is a project of a young christian college student who had an idea while cramming and writing finals papers. Users can highlight any word to learn and get more resources on the topic.
bib.ly is website that does two things. Helps you easily create links to Bible verses like this one: http://bib.ly/Phi2.4.Automatically creates Bible popups on your website.
Just start typing and verses will be returned instantly.
Soundtracking lets users announce what music they are listening to along with where they are and what they are doing at the time.
A simple app to remember must-visit restaurants.  Whether you hear about a new place from a friend, blog, or by walking by, Matchbook will help you remember it later.
4sqwifi enables users to find nearby WiFi hotspots along with the password. It works for locations worldwide. It uses Foursquare's API and its user-generated venue tips.
Are you always going to the same bar, club or restaurant and want to find something new that is similar to the one you like? Use wahili to find new but similar nightlife spots!

When you check-in someplace, we'll tell your friends where they can find you and recommend places to go & things to do nearby. People check-in at all kind of places - cafes, bars, restaurants, parks, homes, offices. You'll find that as your friends use foursquare to check-in, you'll start learning more about the places they frequent.
What were you doing 1 year ago today? Each morning users are sent an email containing reminders of the past including, tweets, facebook posts, Instagram photos and foursquare checkins.

Mashup_name: Create a Custom API for Siri Using SendGrid's Parse API
mashup_Description: This hack was created at [MoDevEast in Washington DC](http://blog.mashery.com/content/awesome-dc-hackathon-usa-today-hq-modeveast). It was designed to be a proof of concept of how you can use the fact that Siri can send emails along with [SendGrid's Parse API](http://docs.sendgrid.com/documentation/api/parse-api-2/) to create your own custom Siri API.When you are done with this tutorial, you will be able to ask Siri to motivate you and Siri will oblidge by calling you via Twilio to tell you "You are Awesome." :)I hope that you take this concept to the next level and dream up interesting things for Siri to do. At the [SendGrid Mobile Hackday](http://sendgridmh.eventbrite.com/) a few developers asked Siri to check them into Foursquare, post to Twitter and remotely launch apps on their Macs.
Meaningtwitt is a mashup between Twitter, Google Visualization API and Meaningtool. It's intended for categorization of Twitter Users through the semantic technology of Meaningtool.

Mashup that automatically geocodes Twitter Public Timeline on GoogleMaps.  Also allows user to search using specific criteria via Twitter Search API, geocodes the response, and plots locations on Google Maps.
The Twitter streaming API is used to deliver real-time stock tips from the highest ranked Twitter stock market experts. Get the details on today's most tweeted stocks, tags, and URLs.
Art and history search engine based on Yahoo BOSS and powered by international museums.
Vegetarian search engine based on Yahoo BOSS and more.
Food search engine powered by local experts and bloggers.
A lightweight diary of books you've used and to share it with friends. Integrated with Amazon's catalog and Facebook. Hosted on Heroku.
A site that is powered by the TravelFusion Direct Connect XML API
A communications platform that allows millions of people to be instantly notified.
Aumio sends scheduled alerts to friends and coworkers by e-mail, text, and phone
Notify member agents of new customers that are seeking real estate agents in their area. Full buyer/seller details are provided over the phone for deciding whether to work with the prospect.
BookFresh is online scheduling and appointment booking application that integrates voice using the Twilio API.
Task.fm is your own personal assistant. Send yourself emails, SMSs, or phone call reminders.
ShoutNow makes sharing your voice through Twitter, Facebook and phones simple and easy. Instantly share voice messages with your friends, family, teams, employees or customers.
Twilleetio is a personal branding application that mashes up Twillio, Twitter, and Django to provide a way to phone in short audio segments which are then tweeted by @Twilleetio
Shows exponentially smoothed flu trends in Sweden based on self-reported health in Twitter messages.
Use Google Maps to easily find the closest Starbucks. Browse a directory of Starbucks locations by state and city, and then get reviews for a location.
Shows textual and visual information for all world countries. For each country, a live map and photos are included, plus a map translated to your language. Uses Google Charts for data visualization.
The local information you want.

A full featured, browser based, Twitter Client. Designed with productivity in mind. Every tweet gets organized into folders automatically for easy navigation.Supports inline conversations, image uploads, trending topics.
Search engine for deals and coupons. Formerly called Wazma.

Mashup_name: Explore the World Sites of India
mashup_Description: Explore World Heritage sites in India, such as Humayun's Tomb, Delhi Qutb Minar, Taj Mahal, Churches and Convents of Goa.

This is a tool for navigating the National Public Radio database, which is broken down in the form of Lists (Topics through Biographies). The data is presented as a sortable and clickable table. Text windows and audio are available...

Tries to simulate the simple joys of talking over CB radio on the highway. Just call in and enter the number of a highway and you will be entered into a group chat with other people traveling along the same road.
Call your team into a conference on demand. Initiate a conference call by calling (404) 939-4907, entering the 5-digit ID, and then you have your team on the phone.

A fun Twitter app to confound your followers. Twibberish takes your typed tweet and randomly translates it into another language, then translates that translation again, through as many languages as you select, until it reaches the end.
View stylish and fashionable apparel, shoes, jewelry and more. A wide range of the best and most special products.

Mashup_name: Map Your Ride/Drive With Biker Footprints
mashup_Description: Display your Google Latitude location and location history. Guest and public access options control who can view your location. Dead Zone keeps your location from being displayed when you are within X miles of the location you specify.
Facebook app that creates eCards from your photo gallery, custom text input and designed templates. Also allows you to select friends to share with and allows you to Tweet it.
A unique and powerful way to view and search eBay video game and system auctions, track the pricing data and popularity of systems and games, and view YouTube videos and Wikipedia pages.

Page updates every 5 minutes with the latest Apple news from Slashdot, Digg, Delicious, Gizmodo, Tuaw, AppleInsider, Yahoo News, Arstechnica, Cult of Mac and more.  New stories are posted on Twitter, Tumblr and identi.ca in real time.
Displays satellite images of all 2009 Formula One Grand Prix Circuits with race results and grand prix information.
InstantWatcher makes browsing, searching, and traversing all the Watch Instantly titles on Netflix easier.
Challenging Flash-based game built on Google Maps Flash. Connect flags and capitals.

A simple service for getting email notifications when new videos are available. Choose videos by keyword or by user so that you can follow a user's videos. Allows you to be the first blogger to post a relevant video.
A WordPress plugin that protects your blog from spam comments. It learns from your training and after a short while will adapt to your personal blog and will accurately detect incoming spam.
Boxee is an open, social media center for Mac os x and Linux that is a fork of Open Source XBMC media center software. It integrates various APIs including ffwd, Last.fm, and flickr.
A music mashup pulling data from Amazon AAWS, YouTube, LyricWiki and Yahoo BOSS.
Search sites such as Autotrader, Cars.com, dealer websites, and newspapers all from one location.
Weather mashup with tagging, forecasting, and commenting, plus personalization and weather tracking. RSS enabled. Registration via OpenId or Facebook Connect.

Related_APIs: Google Maps,Yahoo Geocoding,Yahoo Local Search,Yelp Fusion,Oodle
mashup_Description: A Google Maps mashup that shows apartment rentals from different sources using many features from Google Maps. Additional APIs are used to create value-added features.
Feed for rappers on Twitter.
A Twilio howto where you use Python to ask a caller for a zip code, grab the current weather for that zip code from an RSS feed, and read it back to the caller. All hosted on Google App Engine.
A short url service for locations. Share your locations among devices the easiest way possible.
Your visual personal startpage. It lets you make your own visual startpage and share it with friends and communities.
This is a mashup of two datasources that are not available as an API: (1) Visa and Mastercard pricing rules, and a (2) bank identification (BIN) number database.
The UK's largest map-based directory of B&Bs and Guesthouses.

Mashup_name: US Election Polls: Votes by Strength of States
mashup_Description: Data from: electoral-vote.comBased on presidential election polls, the widget sums electoral votes and groups them into strong states, weak states, etc., to illustrate how much each candidate relies on weak states votes. Data from  electoral-vote.com.
Fuel efficient used car classifieds. Get MPG estimates and annual fuel costs for used cars for sale in your area. Integrates with the Google Base API.
Google search meets DOS shell, in a browser. If you miss command lines, then this app is for you. Feel right at home searching the Web from a shell prompt.
BoyFriend X is a Web 2.0 address book for single women.
GirlFriend X is a web-based little Black Book 2.0 for single guys.
Discover music events and concerts around the world. The Last.fm Music Map mixes Last.fm music social network data with Google Maps.
Lists recent tweets about Amazon.com products from the Twitter public timeline.
Tourism in Peru. Guide to travel agencies, tourist services, cities, tours, history, adventure, nature, gastronomy, pictures, and videos of Peru.

The Yahoo! GeoPlanet API contains about six million places, and YPlaces puts them all at your fingertips. The data is organized like a family, with brothers and sisters, kids and parents, and presented in the form of a tree.
World's hardest working countries based on number of hours worked in a year, as compiled by Forbes.
The mashup helps you to search and map jobs from all the US jobs sites. The sites include Dice, Monster, ITjobs, Career Builder, etc.
A mashup for rating photos on Flickr.
Yellow-page listings with points-of-interest data plotted on a map.
Zudos allows you to view the latest social media buzz on any desired topic through a consolidated interface.
Save and share your favorite restaurants, or use the tag cloud to see others favorites. In Italian.
Personalized aviation weather configured with your favorite METARs, TAFs, and radar images.
Shows all the locations of a chosen physician group.  Click on an icon to see a list of the physicians at that location.
Visitors can add information about prices available in offline shops.
Search real estate listings with photos and maps. Winner of the Adobe Flex Developer Derby.
Quickly edit all your online photos from your browser. Web-based way to fix underexposed photos, remove red-eye, or apply effects to your photos. All online.
Compare traffic for up to five domains with this mashup of Alexa, Compete or Quantcast.
Look for public Flickr photos with this tag-based search.
A search engine for ASP.Net-related applications, code samples, tips, tricks, articles and blog posts based on Google Co-op.
Joobel search for local jobs. In German.
Crime mapping site for Leawood, Kansas.
Watch twitters in real time with this live map that dynamically updates to show the latest twitterings.
Plots the hometowns of the top American Idol contestants.
Generate a tag cloud from music artists similar to the one you submit. Use it find find new bands you like. Including YouTube music videos.
Community-based meta search engine that allows users to collaborate, discuss, tag, and link aggregated search results.
Interactive Maps for the Louisville Metro area - crimes, sex offenders, historic sites, traffic cams, restaurant health ratings, homes for sale.
Search for Photos and Images on Flickr, Yahoo, Riya, Webshots and even News right from a WAP capable phone.
Tour Nanaimo British Columbia with photos plotted on a Google Map.
Up to 2 Gb to share geolocated photos.
An Amazon AWS site. Has SMS feature, library lookups, bios, images, clips, sales rank tracking, reviews and more. Allows price comparison by SMS too.

A housing listings website for all cities of the world. It uses Google Maps to facilitate locating the offers, and RapLeaf to help to create the required trust for transactions to occur. It lets you search graphically by area, even across cities.
Search real estate listings at Trulia and see them plotted on Google Maps.
Travel advisories in the UK on a Google Map (with BBC Backstage data).
Lets you find premiership soccer news by team location. Via Google Maps and BBC Backstage data.
Keep up with the lastest UFO sightings with this combination of Google Maps and data from the National UFO Reporting Center.
The EVDB (now Eventful) API combined with MS MapPoint creates a mini-map (Feedmap) showing bloggers and events nearby a particular blogger.
Interactively see zip code, city, and county regions plotted onto a Google Map. Also features a reverse geocoder to find the closest addresses to a certain location.
Display your Amazon wishlist, listmania list or marketplace seller list on your website.
Social bookmarking and folksonomies for Google Maps
Uses Google and Yahoo APIs to extract microcontent from multiple sites and allows you to rearrange the excerpts.
Habitamos Maps combines postings from Habitamos with Google Maps satellite pictures to show a houses and apartments for sale or to rent (Spain). Warning: slow from US.
smugmug photos overlaid on top of Google Maps.
